metadata.title: CVE-2021-47565 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:mpt3sas: Fix kernel panic during drive powercycle test While looping overshost's sdev list it is possible that one of the drives is getting removedand its sas_target object is freed but its sdev object remains intact.Consequently, a kernel panic can occur while the driver is trying to accessthe sas_address field of sas_target object without also checking thesas_target object for NULL.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
